tasks.task: Farmers performing maintenance on agricultural equipment.
subtasks: Checking the condition of farming equipment.
Lubricating moving parts of the equipment.
Tightening loose bolts and nuts on the equipment.
Cleaning the exterior of the equipment.
Loading harvested crops onto transportation vehicles.
Unloading crops from transportation vehicles into storage areas.
Sorting harvested crops for quality.
Cleaning harvested crops to remove dirt and debris.

tasks.task: Implementing agricultural practices in a field.
subtasks: Operating a tractor or implement to till soil.
Planting seeds into prepared soil rows.
Irrigating crops using a sprinkler system or hoses.
Applying fertilizers or pesticides by hand or via equipment.

tasks.task: Managing livestock in an agricultural setting.
subtasks: Feeding animals in the barn or pasture.
Watering animals and checking water sources.
Cleaning animal living areas to maintain hygiene.
Moving animals between pens or fields as needed.

tasks.task: Handling incidental physical tasks around the farm.
subtasks: Climbing into and out of tractors or other vehicles.
Carrying farm supplies using backpacks or tool belts.
Repairing fences or other farm structures.
Operating valves or gates for irrigation systems.
